Module com.example.lab23a
Package com.example.lab23a.model

Class UserData

java.lang.Object
com.example.lab23a.model.UserData
public class UserData extends Object
Stores and updates user's information, including options, folders and study sets

    • removeSetFromFolder

      public void removeSetFromFolder(SetIndex index, Folder folder)
      Removes index from folder. If the index is not in the folder, nothing changes.
      Parameters:
      index - - study set that has to be removed from folder.
      folder - - folder, from which the index will be deleted
